info.title: Token Balance API
info.description: This API provides realtime balances information from accounts across different blockchains.

get.summary: Get EVM token prices for a specified contract address (or the native token), on any chain.

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The contract address of the token or 'native' for the native token of the chain

parameters.name: historical_prices
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of unsigned 32-bit integers representing a number of hours offset from the present.

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Get SVM transactions for a given address
get.description: This endpoint returns transactions for a given address across several SVM chains.

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet to get transactions for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to paginate through the result sets. This is a cursor being passed from the previous response, only use what the backend has returned on previous responses.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server

get.summary: Get balance for a specific token for a given address
get.description: This endpoint returns the balance of a specific token for an address on a specified chain

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet to get balance for

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token address or 'native' for native token

parameters.name: chain_ids
parameters.description: A single chain ID to get balance for. Example: chain_ids=1. Please see the response of the /chains endpoint for supported chain IDs.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of additional metadata fields to include for each token. Supported values: `logo`, `url`

parameters.name: historical_prices
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of unsigned 32-bit integers representing a number of hours offset from the present at which to fetch historical prices for each token.

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Get EVM token balances for a given address
get.description: This endpoint returns EVM token balances for an address for any token that the address has interacted with

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet to get balances for

parameters.name: chain_ids
parameters.description: A comma separated list of chain_ids or tags for blockchains to get balances for. Examples: chain_ids=1,8453,10, chain_ids=mainnet,testnet.  Only balances for blockchains tagged with all the specified tags are returned. Please see the response of the /chains endpoint for the tags on each blockchain.

parameters.name: exclude_spam_tokens
parameters.description: Specify this to exclude spam tokens from the response

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Specify `ERC20` or `NATIVE` to get only ERC20 tokens or native assets, respectively

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: A comma separated list of additional metadata fields to include for each token. Supported values: `logo`, `url`, `pools`

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to paginate through result sets. This is a cursor being passed from the previous response, only use what the backend returns here.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

parameters.name: historical_prices
parameters.description: A comma separated list of unsigned 32-bit integers representing a number of hours offset from the present at which to fetch historical prices for each token.

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Get holdings of ERC721 tokens and balances of ERC1155 tokens for a specified wallet, on any EVM chains.

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet to get collectibles for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for paginating through result sets; this is a cursor passed from the previous response, only use what the backend returns here

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of collectibles to return

parameters.name: filter_spam
parameters.description: Filter out spam collectibles (default: true)

parameters.name: show_spam_scores
parameters.description: Show spam scores for collectibles (default: false)

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Get the balances leaderboard for any ERC20 token on any EVM chain.

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Contract address of the token to get the leaderboard for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to paginate through result sets; this is a cursor passed from the previous response, only use what the backend returns here

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of leaderboard entries to return

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Get EVM transactions for a given address
get.description:
This endpoint returns transactions for a given address across several EVM chains.
By setting the decode parameter you can optionally choose to get both function calls and logs decoded.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet to get transactions for

parameters.name: X-Dune-Api-Key
parameters.description: API key to access the service

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to paginate through result sets. This is a cursor being passed from the previous response, only use what the backend has returned on previous responses.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Return only transactions before this block time

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter transactions to a given address

parameters.name: method_id
parameters.description: Return only transactions with this method id

parameters.name: decode
parameters.description: Return abi decoded transactions and logs

parameters.name: log_address
parameters.description: Return only transactions with this address in logs

parameters.name: topic0
parameters.description: Return only transactions with this topic0 in logs

parameters.name: min_block_number
parameters.description: Return only transactions from blocks with block number equal to or greater than this value

400.description: Bad Request - The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed data

500.description: Internal Server Error - A generic error occurred on the server

HistoricalPrice.description: A single historical price for the balances and tokens endpoints.

offset_hours.description: Offset in hours (in the past) from the current time.

price_usd.description: Price in USD at the offset.

oneOf.description: Originally sourced from Alchemy's spam detection system, renamed for API consistency

TokensResponse.description: Response type for both price endpoints.

Warning.description: Warning that can be included in API responses

WarningCode.description: Warning code enum for different types of warnings
